summary: Mesh and Tex rework to create Spartan armor
descriptionHtml:
I just got inspired by my latest work to mess around a bit with some other armor pieces.  This was the result.  This mesh and these textures replace the regular Imperial Armor in game, and the shield is a recolored Ysgramor\'s shield.  

I wish I knew how to do a .bat to put with it so that you can just type a command and receive the exact armor items in your inventory, but you\'ll have to get them in the world or with the coc qasmoke console command.

I\'m happy with the end result, hope you enjoy it.


Other mods:
Ancient Nord Armor First Person Fix - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2808
Gil Hibben Dagger Replacements - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4950
Linwe\'s Armor Male First Person Fix - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1956
Barbarian Thief Armor - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2094
Sleeveless Nightingale Armor Retex - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3637
author: Solidus2845
